sentences.sContent: Since deregulation, banks are permitted to set their own interest rates.
sentences.sCn: 解除管制后，银行获准自定利率。

synos.tran: 违反规定，反常；撤消管制规定

trans.tranCn: 撤销管理规定， 解除控制， 解除管制
trans.tranOther: Deregulation is the removal of controls and restrictions in a particular area of business or trade
